com.googlecode.routing.simulator
Class Router

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.routing.simulator.Router

public class Router
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the Router and calls the actions to communicate and receive messages from other Routers

Author:
Felipe Ribeiro, Michelly Guedes, Renato Miceli
